title: Mountain trip logger Wear
summary: Android Wear extension for Mountain trip logger GOLD and Chizroid.
description: #####################################Please note that Android Wear 2.0 is not supported.#####################################Mountain trip logger Wear is an application for use from Android Wear the "Mountain trip logger GOLD" and "Chizroid".-Require Chizroid version 10.10+.-Require Mountain trip logger GOLD version 4.28+.====================■ What you can do◇ Chizroid linking (Free)-Show map (Cached map only. Japanese topographic map, Yahoo map, Custom map)-Add here to bookmark. Support the voice action of "Take a note".◇ Mountain trip logger GOLD linking (Require purchasing premium version. JPY 220)-Start logging and stop logging.-Show average speed, total time and total distance.-Notify the alarm by vibration. Arrival alarm and Deviate alarm.
descriptionHTML:
#####################################
Please note that Android Wear 2.0 is not supported.
#####################################

Mountain trip logger Wear is an application for use from Android Wear the "Mountain trip logger GOLD" and "Chizroid".
-Require Chizroid version 10.10+.
-Require Mountain trip logger GOLD version 4.28+.

====================
■ What you can do

◇ Chizroid linking (Free)
-Show map (Cached map only. Japanese topographic map, Yahoo map, Custom map)
-Add here to bookmark. Support the voice action of "Take a note".

◇ Mountain trip logger GOLD linking (Require purchasing premium version. JPY 220)
-Start logging and stop logging.
-Show average speed, total time and total distance.
-Notify the alarm by vibration. Arrival alarm and Deviate alarm.
recentChanges: -Support the pause function of Mountain trip logger v7.0.
-Supported customizing the page display order at Wear.
